T02D1500:250a-1: sva adhishth'a na kra ma au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02D1500:250a-3: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba /
T02D1500:250a-4: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1500:250a-5: rin chen gnas las rin chen rnyed //
T02D1500:250a-6: blo yi nor can 'ga' yod kyang //
T02D1500:250b-0: legs par @250b yongs brtags rin po che //
T02D1500:250b-1: dam pas rgyan dpal 'jigs med mchog //
T02D1500:250b-2: 'dir snying rje chen pos aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1500:250b-3: zhes bya ba 'di'i don la mngon du phyogs shing
T02D1500:250b-4: rang bzhin gyis lus stong pa nyid la skad cig
T02D1500:250b-5: gis bde mchog zhabs g-yas brkyang bas sna tshogs mu
T02D1500:250b-6: skyes dang nyi ma la 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan
T02D1500:250b-7: mnan pa rdo rje dang dril bu dang bcas pa'i
T02D1500:250b-8: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi snod
T02D1500:250b-9: dang bcas pa'i phyag zung can /
T02D1500:250b-10: dbu la gnas pa'i thod pa lang dang bcas pa /
T02D1500:250b-11: mgo bo skam po'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1500:250b-12: dbu stha sngon po'i tshogs grol zhing 'khyil ba /
T02D1500:250b-13: spyan gsum pa me tog bandhu ka lta bu'i rdo
T02D1500:250b-14: rje phag mo la 'khyud cing mtsho skyes dang gnyis
T02D1500:250b-15: su med pa'i dga' ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1500:250b-16: me tog kanda li kha bye ma thug gi kha dog mdzes pa /
T02D1500:250b-17: gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs can /
T02D1500:250b-18: ral pa nag po'i thor tshugs brdzes pa'i rtse mor nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mdzes //
T02D1500:250b-19: bde'i 'og tu g-yon du bsil 'od can gyi cha gnas pa /
T02D1500:250b-20: gdan sna tshogs rdo rje la thub pa mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa /
T02D1500:250b-21: dpral ba'i mtha'i gnas su thod pa lngas brgyan pa phyag rgya drug pa /
T02D1500:250b-22: rlan dang bcas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng bas sku rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D1500:250b-23: mdzes ma'i mchu'i sbrang rtsi'i btung ba'i ro dang ldan pa /
T02D1500:250b-24: spyan gsum pa zhal gcig pa /
T02D1500:250b-25: dpal gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i nyi ma h'um sngon
T02D1500:250b-26: po rang bcas pa'i bdag nyid dang rog gcig pa
T02D1500:250b-27: nyid kyis rang dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba brtan pa
T02D1500:250b-28: dang bcas pa'i g-yo ba bcom ldan 'das ma la'o
T02D1500:250b-29: // de'i thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das la'o //
T02D1500:250b-30: de bdag nyid gdan dang bcas pa thugs ga'i nyi ma dang bcas pa h'um gi rnam pa la'o //
T02D1500:250b-31: de don yod grub pa'i ngo bo au'i rnam pa
T02D1500:250b-32: ni 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin ha'i rnam pa
T02D1500:250b-33: la'o // de rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo mgo bo'i ri mo la'o //
T02D1500:250b-34: de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin zla tshes la'o //
T02D1500:250b-35: de mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin n'a da dang bcas pa'i thig le la'o //
T02D1500:251a-0: de yang rim gyis bsdus pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku @251a * //
T02D1500:251a-1: 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid bsam gyis me khyab pa la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1500:251a-2: 'di ni 'dir rjes su gzhig pa'i rim pas me
T02D1500:251a-3: long la dbugs kyis rlangs pa yal ba ltar sa
T02D1500:251a-4: bcu'i dbang phyug sgyu ma'i skus bcu gcig par sgrib
T02D1500:251a-5: pa dang bcas pa'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'i ngo
T02D1500:251a-6: bo 'od gsal du zhugs pa rab tu bstan to
T02D1500:251a-7: // de nas rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba mtha'
T02D1500:251a-8: dag gi bag chags drungs nas phyung ba ni gdul
T02D1500:251a-9: bya'i skye bo'i bsod nams dang rang gi smon lam
T02D1500:251a-10: gyis 'phen bas skad cig gis bdag nyid spos pa
T02D1500:251a-11: thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid bde ba
T02D1500:251a-12: chen po'i rang bzhin thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo
T02D1500:251a-13: nyid kyis zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rgyun
T02D1500:251a-14: mi 'chad pa sprul pa sna tshogs pa rab 'byams
T02D1500:251a-15: rnams kyis nam mkha'i khongs gang bas gzhan gyi don
T02D1500:251a-16: yang dag par bsgrub par 'byung ngo //
T02D1500:251a-17: bskyed pa'i rim pa mchog la gnas pa'i las dang
T02D1500:251a-18: po pas 'di mtha' dag so sor yang dang yang
T02D1500:251a-20: 'bring gis ni zung 'jug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
T02D1500:251a-21: skad cig gis 'od gsal du zhugs pa dang bzhengs
T02D1500:251a-22: pa kho na'o // mchog gi slar zung 'jug gi bdag nyid du bzhengs pa kho na'o //
T02D1500:251a-23: 'di nyid lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa mchog gi
T02D1500:251a-24: mchog rab tu gsal ba mthar thug pa zung 'jug
T02D1500:251a-25: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen
T02D1500:251a-26: po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1500:251a-27: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang chen du mdzad
T02D1500:251a-28: pa bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi man ngag gis
T02D1500:251a-29: rang dang mnyam pas kyang dran par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1500:251a-30: mkhas pa 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas rnam par
T02D1500:251a-31: gsal zhing nges par byas pa rang byin gyis brlab
T02D1500:251a-32: pa'i rim pa'i man ngag go //
T02D1500:251a-33: 'di las legs byas tshogs rnams kyi //
T02D1500:251a-35: myur du 'gro rnams mun bcom zhing ;
T02D1500:251a-36: / bde mchog dpal gyi sku 'dzin shog / dngos
T02D1500:251a-37: grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po aa bha y'a
T02D1500:251a-38: ka ra gupta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa 'di rdzogs
T02D1500:251a-40: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bde mchog nyid
T02D1500:251a-41: dang dbyar med pa'i pandi ta chen po dpal rje
T02D1500:251a-42: btsun ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas dang /
